definitions.text: a high-pitched noise resembling a human cry
examples: he ducked at the screechings of shells
he heard the scream of the brakes

definitions.text: a joke that seems extremely funny

examples: she cried with pain when the doctor inserted the needle
I yelled to her from the window but she couldn't hear me

definitions.text: utter or declare in a very loud voice
examples: You don't have to yell--I can hear you just fine
Fighter planes are screaming through the skies
